rooms.name: West Of House
rooms.description: You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door. There is a small mailbox here.

rooms.name: Stone Barrow
rooms.description: You are standing in front of a massive stone barrow. In the east face of the barrow is a huge stone door which is open. You cannot see into the dark of the tomb.

rooms.name: North Of House
rooms.description: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded up. To the north a narrow path winds through the trees.

rooms.name: South Of House
rooms.description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded.

rooms.name: East Of House
rooms.description: You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

rooms.name: Forest 1
rooms.description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

rooms.name: Forest 2
rooms.description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around.

rooms.name: Mountains
rooms.description: The forest thins out, revealing impassable mountains.

rooms.name: Forest 3
rooms.description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around.

rooms.name: Path
rooms.description: This is a path winding through a dimly lit forest. The path heads north-south here. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands at the edge of the path.

rooms.name: Up A Tree
rooms.description: You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches. The nearest branch above you is above your reach.

rooms.name: Grating Clearing
rooms.description: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on all sides. A path leads south.

rooms.name: Clearing
rooms.description: You are in a small clearing in a well marked forest path that extends to the east and west.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food.

rooms.name: Attic
rooms.description: This is the attic. The only exit is a stairway leading down.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: You are in the living room. There is a doorway to the east, a wooden door with strange gothic lettering to the west, which appears to be nailed shut, a trophy case, and a large oriental rug in the center of the room.

rooms.name: Cellar
rooms.description: You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. On the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is unclimbable.

rooms.name: Troll Room
rooms.description: This is a small room with passages to the east and south and a forbidding hole leading west. Bloodstains and deep scratches (perhaps made by an axe) mar the walls.

rooms.name: East Of Chasm
rooms.description: You are on the east edge of a chasm, the bottom of which cannot be seen. A narrow passage goes north, and the path you are on continues to the east.

rooms.name: Gallery
rooms.description: This is an art gallery. Most of the paintings have been stolen by vandals with exceptional taste. The vandals left through either the north or west exits.

rooms.name: Studio
rooms.description: This appears to have been an artist's studio. The walls and floors are splattered with paints of 69 different colors. Strangely enough, nothing of value is hanging here. At the south end of the room is an open door (also covered with paint). A dark and narrow chimney leads up from a fireplace; although you might be able to get up it, it seems unlikely you could get back down.

rooms.name: Maze 1
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Maze 2
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Maze 3
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Maze 4
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Dead End 1
rooms.description: You have come to a dead end in the maze.

rooms.name: Maze 5
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike. A skeleton, probably the remains of a luckless adventurer, lies here.

rooms.name: Dead End 2
rooms.description: You have come to a dead end in the maze.

rooms.name: Maze 6
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Maze 7
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Maze 8
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Dead End 3
rooms.description: You have come to a dead end in the maze.

rooms.name: Maze 9
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Maze 10
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Maze 11
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Grating Room
rooms.description: You are in a small room near the maze. There are twisty passages in the immediate vicinity.

rooms.name: Maze 12
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Dead End 4
rooms.description: You have come to a dead end in the maze.

rooms.name: Maze 13
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Maze 14
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Maze 15
rooms.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

rooms.name: Cyclops Room
rooms.description: This is a large room with a massive vaulted stone ceiling. Cyclopean stone pillars support the ceiling and cast weird, moving shadows around the room. In the center of the room is a massive table hewn of solid granite. In front of the table is a marble throne. Seated on the throne is a massive figure.

rooms.name: Strange Passage
rooms.description: This is a long passage. To the west is one entrance. On the east there is an old wooden door, with a large opening in it (about cyclops sized).

rooms.name: Treasure Room
rooms.description: This is a large room, whose east wall is solid granite. A number of discarded bags, which crumble at your touch, are scattered about on the floor. There is an exit down a staircase.

rooms.name: Reservoir South
rooms.description: You are in a long room on the south shore of a large lake, far too deep and wide for crossing.

rooms.name: Reservoir
rooms.description: You are in a long room on the south shore of a large reservoir. A path leads from the west around the north edge of the water.

rooms.name: Reservoir North
rooms.description: You are in a long room on the north shore of a large lake, far too deep and wide for crossing.

rooms.name: Stream View
rooms.description: You are standing on a path beside a gently flowing stream. The path follows the stream, which flows from west to east.

rooms.name: In Stream
rooms.description: You are on the gently flowing stream. The upstream route is too narrow to navigate, and the downstream route is invisible due to twisting walls. There is a narrow beach to land on.

rooms.name: Mirror Room 1
rooms.description: You are in a large square room with tall ceilings. On the south wall is an enormous mirror which fills the entire wall. There are exits on the other three sides of the room.

rooms.name: Mirror Room 2
rooms.description: You are in a large square room with tall ceilings. On the north wall is an enormous mirror which fills the entire wall. There are exits on the other three sides of the room.

rooms.name: Small Cave
rooms.description: This is a small cave with an entrance to the east and a stairway leading down.

rooms.name: Tiny Cave
rooms.description: This is a tiny cave with entrances west and north, and a dark, forbidding staircase leading down.

rooms.name: Cold Passage
rooms.description: This is a cold and damp corridor where a long east-west passageway turns into a southward path.

rooms.name: Narrow Passage
rooms.description: This is a long and narrow corridor where a long north-south passageway briefly narrows even further.

rooms.name: Winding Passage
rooms.description: This is a winding passage. It seems that there are only exits on the east and north.

rooms.name: Twisting Passage
rooms.description: This is a winding passage. It seems that there are only exits on the east and north.

rooms.name: Atlantis Room
rooms.description: This is an ancient room, long under water. There is an exit to the south and a staircase leading up.

rooms.name: Ew Passage
rooms.description: This is a narrow east-west passageway. There is a narrow stairway leading down at the north end of the room.

rooms.name: Round Room
rooms.description: This is a circular stone room with passages in all directions. Several of them have unfortunately been blocked by cave-ins.

rooms.name: Deep Canyon
rooms.description: You are on the south edge of a deep canyon. Passages lead off to the east, northwest and southwest. You can hear the sound of flowing water from below.

rooms.name: Damp Cave
rooms.description: This cave has exits to the west and east, and narrows to a crack toward the south. The earth is particularly damp here.

rooms.name: Loud Room
rooms.description: This is a large room with a ceiling which cannot be detected from the ground. There is a narrow passage from east to west and a stone stairway leading upward.

rooms.name: Ns Passage
rooms.description: This is a north-south passageway with stone walls and a stone floor.

rooms.name: Chasm Room
rooms.description: A chasm runs southwest to northeast and the path follows it. You are on the south side of the chasm, where a crack opens into a passage.

rooms.name: Entrance To Hades
rooms.description: You are outside a large gateway on which is inscribed: 'Abandon every hope all ye who enter here'. The gate is open; through it you can see a desolation, with a pile of mangled bodies in one corner. Thousands of voices, lamenting some hideous fate, can be heard.

rooms.name: Land Of Living Dead
rooms.description: You have entered the Land of the Living Dead. Thousands of lost souls can be heard weeping and moaning. In the corner are stacked the remains of dozens of previous adventurers less fortunate than yourself. A passage exits to the north.

rooms.name: Engravings Cavewascave4
rooms.description: You have entered a low cave with passages leading northwest and east. There are old engravings on the walls here.

rooms.name: Egypt Roomwasegypt
rooms.description: This is a room which looks like an Egyptian tomb. There is an ascending staircase to the west.

rooms.name: Dome Roomwasdome
rooms.description: This is a large room with a domed ceiling.

rooms.name: Torch Room
rooms.description: This is a large room with a prominent doorway leading to a down staircase. Above you is a large dome painted with scenes depicting elvish heros in battle. Up around the edge of the dome (20 feet up) is a wooden railing.

rooms.name: North Templewastemp1
rooms.description: This is the north end of a large temple. On the east wall is an ancient inscription, probably a prayer in a long-forgotten language. Below the prayer is a staircase leading down. The west wall is solid granite. The exit to the north end of the room is through huge marble pillars.

rooms.name: South Templewastemp2
rooms.description: This is the south end of a large temple. In front of you is what appears to be an altar. In one corner is a small hole in the floor which leads into darkness. You probably could not get back up it.

rooms.name: Dam Roomwasdam
rooms.description: You are standing on the top of Flood Control Dam #3.

rooms.name: Dam Lobbywaslobby
rooms.description: This room appears to have been the waiting room for groups touring the dam. There are open doorways here to the north and east marked "Private", and there is a path leading south over the top of the dam.

rooms.name: Maintenance Roomwasmaint
rooms.description: This is what appears to have been the maintenance room for Flood Control Dam #3. Apparently, this room has been ransacked recently, for most of the valuable equipment is gone. On the wall in front of you is a group of buttons colored blue, yellow, brown, and red. There are doorways to the west and south.

rooms.name: Dam Basewasdock
rooms.description: You are at the base of Flood Control Dam #3, which looms above you and to the north. The river Frigid is flowing by here. Along the river are the White Cliffs which seem to form giant walls stretching from north to south along the shores of the river as it winds its way downstream.

rooms.name: River 1wasrivr1
rooms.description: You are on the Frigid River in the vicinity of the Dam. The river flows quietly here. There is a landing on the west shore.

rooms.name: River 2wasrivr2
rooms.description: The river turns a corner here making it impossible to see the Dam. The White Cliffs loom on the east bank and large rocks prevent landing on the west.

rooms.name: River 3wasrivr3
rooms.description: The river descends here into a valley. There is a narrow beach on the west shore below the cliffs. In the distance a faint rumbling can be heard.

rooms.name: White Cliffs Northwaswclf1
rooms.description: You are on a narrow strip of beach which runs along the base of the White Cliffs. There is a narrow path heading south along the Cliffs and a tight passage leading west into the cliffs themselves.

rooms.name: White Cliffs Southwaswclf2
rooms.description: You are on a rocky, narrow strip of beach beside the Cliffs. A narrow path leads north along the shore.

rooms.name: River 4wasrivr4
rooms.description: The river is running faster here and the sound ahead appears to be that of rushing water. On the east shore is a sandy beach. A small area of beach can also be seen below the cliffs on the west shore.

rooms.name: River 5wasrivr5
rooms.description: The sound of rushing water is nearly unbearable here. On the east shore is a large landing area.

rooms.name: Shorewasfante
rooms.description: You are on the east shore of the river. The water here seems somewhat treacherous. A path travels from north to south here, the south end quickly turning around a sharp corner.

rooms.name: Sandy Beachwasbeach
rooms.description: You are on a large sandy beach on the east shore of the river, which is flowing quickly by. A path runs from the sandy beach to the north and south.

rooms.name: Sandy Cavewastcave
rooms.description: This is a sandy cave whose exit is to the southwest.

rooms.name: Aragain Fallswasfalls
rooms.description: You are at the top of Aragain Falls, an enormous waterfall with a drop of about 450 feet. The only path here is on the north side of the river.

rooms.name: On Rainbowwasrainb
rooms.description: You are on top of a rainbow.

rooms.name: End Of Rainbowwaspog
rooms.description: You are on a small, rocky beach on the continuation of the Frigid River past the Falls. The beach is narrow due to the presence of the White Cliffs. The river canyon opens here and sunlight shines in from above. A rainbow crosses over the falls to the east and a narrow path continues to the southwest.

rooms.name: Canyon Bottomwasclbot
rooms.description: You are beneath the walls of the river canyon which may be climbable here. The lesser part of the runoff of Aragain Falls flows by below. To the north is a narrow path.

rooms.name: Cliff Middlewasclmid
rooms.description: You are on a small ledge about halfway up the wall of the river canyon. You can see from here that the main flow from Aragain Falls twists along a passage which it is impossible for you to enter. Below you is the canyon bottom. Above you the canyon wall rises to the top of the White Cliffs.

rooms.name: Canyon Viewwascltop
rooms.description: You are at the top of the Great Canyon on its south wall. From here there is a marvelous view of the canyon and parts of the Frigid River upstream. Across the canyon, the walls of the White Cliffs still appear to loom far above. Following the canyon upstream to the north, Aragain Falls may be seen, complete with rainbow. The canyon continues south, where a dark cloud seems to be gathering. The top of the eastern cliff is higher than you are. You are on a narrow shelf which runs along the south wall.

rooms.name: Mine Entrancewasentra
rooms.description: You are standing at the entrance of what might have been a coal mine. The shaft enters the west wall, and there is another exit on the south end of the room.

rooms.name: Squeeky Roomwassquee
rooms.description: You are in a small room. Strange squeaky sounds may be heard coming from the passage at the north end. You may also escape to the east.

rooms.name: Bat Roomwasbats
rooms.description: You are in a small room which has doors only to the east and south.

rooms.name: Shaft Roomwastshaf
rooms.description: This is a large room, in the middle of which is a small shaft descending through the floor into darkness below. To the west and the north are exits from this room. Constructed over the top of the shaft is a metal framework to which a heavy iron chain is attached.

rooms.name: Smelly Roomwassmell
rooms.description: This is a small nondescript room. However, from the direction of a small descending staircase a foul odor can be detected. To the south is a narrow tunnel.

rooms.name: Gas Roomwasboom
rooms.description: This is a small room which smells strongly of coal gas. There is a short climb up some stairs and a narrow tunnel leading east.

rooms.name: Ladder Topwastladd
rooms.description: This is a very small room. In the corner is a rickety wooden ladder, leading downward. It might be safe to descend. There is also a staircase leading upward.

rooms.name: Ladder Bottomwasbladd
rooms.description: This is a rather wide room. On one side is the bottom of a narrow wooden ladder. To the west and the south are passages leaving the room.

rooms.name: Dead End 5wasdead7
rooms.description: You have come to a dead end in the mine.

rooms.name: Timber Roomwastimbe
rooms.description: This is a long and narrow passage, which is cluttered with broken timbers. A wide passage comes from the east and turns at the west end of the room into a very narrow passageway. From the west comes a strong draft.

rooms.name: Lower Shaftwasbshaf
rooms.description: This is a small drafty room in which is the bottom of a long shaft. To the south is a passageway and to the east a very narrow passage. In the shaft can be seen a heavy iron chain.

rooms.name: Machine Roomwasmachi
rooms.description: This is a large room full of assorted heavy machinery. The room smells of coal smoke. There is a small coal stove here. The exit is to the south. To the north is a pile of machine parts.

rooms.name: Mine 1wasmine1
rooms.description: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

rooms.name: Mine 2wasmine2
rooms.description: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

rooms.name: Mine 3wasmine3
rooms.description: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

rooms.name: Mine 4wasmine4
rooms.description: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

rooms.name: Slide Roomwasslide
rooms.description: This is a small chamber, which appears to have been part of a coal mine. On the south wall of the chamber the letters "Granite Wall" are etched in the rock. To the east is a long passage, and there is a steep metal slide twisting downward. To the north is a small opening.

rooms.name: Large Cavernous Room
rooms.description:
You are in a large cavernous room, to the south of which was formerly
a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely
a wide stream running through the center of the room.

rooms.name: Large Cavernous Room
rooms.description:
You are in a large cavernous room, to the south of which was formerly
a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely
a wide stream running through the center of the room.

rooms.name: Large Cavernous Room
rooms.description:
You are in a large cavernous room, to the south of which was formerly
a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely
a wide stream running through the center of the room.

rooms.name: Large Cavernous Room
rooms.description:
You are in a large cavernous room, to the south of which was formerly
a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely
a wide stream running through the center of the room.

rooms.name: Large Cavernous Room
rooms.description:
You are in a large cavernous room, to the south of which was formerly
a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely
a wide stream running through the center of the room.

rooms.name: There Is A Tunnel Leaving The Room To The North
rooms.description: There is a tunnel leaving the room to the north.
rooms.shortDescription: There Is A Tunnel Leaving The Room To The North

rooms.name: There Is A Tunnel Leaving The Room To The North
rooms.description: There is a tunnel leaving the room to the north.
rooms.shortDescription: There Is A Tunnel Leaving The Room To The North

rooms.name: Large Cavernous Room
rooms.description:
You are in a large cavernous room, to the south of which was formerly
a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely
a wide stream running through the center of the room.

rooms.name: A Large Room With Giant
rooms.description:
You are in a large room with giant icicles hanging from the walls
and ceiling.  There are passages to the north and east.

rooms.name: The Cave Is Very Windy
rooms.description: The cave is very windy at the moment, and your candles have blown out.

rooms.name: Small Room That Has Only One Door
rooms.description: You are in a small room that has only one door, to the east.
rooms.shortDescription: A Small Room That Has Only One Door, To The East

rooms.name: Small Room That Has Only One Door
rooms.description: You are in a small room that has only one door, to the east.
rooms.shortDescription: A Small Room That Has Only One Door, To The East

rooms.name: In The Corner Of The
rooms.description:
In the corner of the room on the ceiling is a large vampire bat who
is obviously deranged and holding his nose.

rooms.name: In The Corner Of The
rooms.description:
In the corner of the room on the ceiling is a large vampire bat who
is obviously deranged and holding his nose.

rooms.name: In The Corner Of The
rooms.description:
In the corner of the room on the ceiling is a large vampire bat who
is obviously deranged and holding his nose.

rooms.name: A Deranged Vampire Bat (a
rooms.description:
A deranged vampire bat (a reject from WUMPUS) swoops down
from the ceiling and lifts you away...

rooms.name: A Deranged Vampire Bat (a
rooms.description:
A deranged vampire bat (a reject from WUMPUS) swoops down
from the ceiling and lifts you away...

rooms.name: The Periphery Of A Large
rooms.description:
You are at the periphery of a large dome, which forms the ceiling
of another room below.  Protecting you from a precipitous drop is a
wooden railing which circles the dome.

rooms.name: The Periphery Of A Large
rooms.description:
You are at the periphery of a large dome, which forms the ceiling
of another room below.  Protecting you from a precipitous drop is a
wooden railing which circles the dome.

rooms.name: The Periphery Of A Large
rooms.description:
You are at the periphery of a large dome, which forms the ceiling
of another room below.  Protecting you from a precipitous drop is a
wooden railing which circles the dome.

rooms.name: The Periphery Of A Large
rooms.description:
You are at the periphery of a large dome, which forms the ceiling
of another room below.  Protecting you from a precipitous drop is a
wooden railing which circles the dome.

rooms.name: Hanging Down From The Railing
rooms.description:
Hanging down from the railing is a rope which ends about ten feet
from the floor below.

rooms.name: Hanging Down From The Railing
rooms.description:
Hanging down from the railing is a rope which ends about ten feet
from the floor below.

rooms.name: Hanging Down From The Railing
rooms.description:
Hanging down from the railing is a rope which ends about ten feet
from the floor below.

rooms.name: I'm Afraid That The Leap
rooms.description: I'm afraid that the leap you attempted has done you in.

rooms.name: A Large Room With A
rooms.description:
You are in a large room with a prominent doorway leading to a down
staircase.  To the west is a narrow twisting tunnel.  Above you is a
large dome painted with scenes depicting elvish hacking rites.  Up
around the edge of the dome (20 feet up) is a wooden railing.  In the
center of the room there is a white marble pedestal.

rooms.name: Unfortunately
rooms.description:
Unfortunately, you have managed to destroy it by your reckless
actions.

rooms.name: Large Room Which Seems To Be Air Conditioned
rooms.description:
You are in large room which seems to be air conditioned.  In one
corner there is a machine (?) which is shaped somewhat like a clothes
dryer.  On the 'panel' there is a switch which is labelled in an
obscure dialect of Swahili.  Fortunately, I know this dialect, and the
label translates to 'START'.  The switch does not appear to be manip-
ulable by any human hand (unless the fingers are about 1/16 by 1/4
inch).  On the front of the machine is a large lid, which is #.
rooms.shortDescription: Large Room Which Seems To Be Air Conditioned

rooms.name: Large Room Which Seems To Be Air Conditioned
rooms.description:
You are in large room which seems to be air conditioned.  In one
corner there is a machine (?) which is shaped somewhat like a clothes
dryer.  On the 'panel' there is a switch which is labelled in an
obscure dialect of Swahili.  Fortunately, I know this dialect, and the
label translates to 'START'.  The switch does not appear to be manip-
ulable by any human hand (unless the fingers are about 1/16 by 1/4
inch).  On the front of the machine is a large lid, which is #.

rooms.name: In The Corner Of The
rooms.description:
In the corner of the room on the ceiling is a large vampire bat who
is obviously deranged and holding his nose.

from the ceiling and lifts you away...

from the ceiling and lifts you away...

rooms.name: A Deranged Vampire Bat (a
rooms.description:
A deranged vampire bat (a reject from WUMPUS) swoops down
from the ceiling and lifts you away...

rooms.name: Large Cavernous Room
rooms.description:
You are in a large cavernous room, to the south of which was formerly
a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely
a wide stream running through the center of the room.

rooms.name: Large Cavernous Room
rooms.description:
You are in a large cavernous room, to the south of which was formerly
a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely
a wide stream running through the center of the room.

rooms.description:

a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely
a wide stream running through the center of the room.

rooms.description:

rooms.description:
You are in a large cavernous room, to the south of which was formerly
a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely

rooms.name: Large Cavernous Room
rooms.description:
You are in a large cavernous room, to the south of which was formerly
a reservoir.  However, with the water level lowered, there is merely
a wide stream running through the center of the room.

rooms.name: There Is A Tunnel Leaving The Room To The North
rooms.description: There is a tunnel leaving the room to the north.
rooms.shortDescription: There Is A Tunnel Leaving The Room To The North

rooms.name: A Large Room With Giant
rooms.description:
You are in a large room with giant icicles hanging from the walls
and ceiling.  There are passages to the north and east.

rooms.name: A Large Room With Giant

and ceiling.  There are passages to the north and east.

rooms.name: A Large Square Room With Tall Ceilings
rooms.description:
You are in a large square room with tall ceilings.  There are exits
on the north, east, and west sides of the room.  On the south wall is
an enormous mirror which fills the entire wall.
rooms.shortDescription: A Large Square Room With Tall Ceilings

rooms.name: Large Room Which Seems To Be Air Conditioned
rooms.description:
You are in large room which seems to be air conditioned.  In one
corner there is a machine (?) which is shaped somewhat like a clothes
dryer.  On the 'panel' there is a switch which is labelled in an
obscure dialect of Swahili.  Fortunately, I know this dialect, and the
label translates to 'START'.  The switch does not appear to be manip-
ulable by any human hand (unless the fingers are about 1/16 by 1/4
inch).  On the front of the machine is a large lid, which is #.
rooms.shortDescription: Large Room Which Seems To Be Air Conditioned

rooms.name: The Cave Is Very Windy
rooms.description: The cave is very windy at the moment, and your candles have blown out.

rooms.name: A Deranged Vampire Bat (a
rooms.description:
A deranged vampire bat (a reject from WUMPUS) swoops down
from the ceiling and lifts you away...

rooms.name: Hanging Down From The Railing
rooms.description:
Hanging down from the railing is a rope which ends about ten feet
from the floor below.

rooms.name: I'm Afraid That The Leap
rooms.description: I'm afraid that the leap you attempted has done you in.

rooms.name: A Large Room With A
rooms.description:
You are in a large room with a prominent doorway leading to a down
staircase.  To the west is a narrow twisting tunnel.  Above you is a
large dome painted with scenes depicting elvish hacking rites.  Up
around the edge of the dome (20 feet up) is a wooden railing.  In the
center of the room there is a white marble pedestal.

rooms.name: A Large Room With A

center of the room there is a white marble pedestal.

rooms.name: A Large Piece Of Rope
rooms.description:
A large piece of rope descends from the railing above, ending some
five feet above your head.

rooms.name: A Circular Room With Passages
rooms.description: You are in a circular room with passages off in eight directions.

rooms.name: A Circular Room With Passages
rooms.description: You are in a circular room with passages off in eight directions.

rooms.name: Your Compass Needle Spins Wildly
rooms.description: Your compass needle spins wildly, and you cannot get your bearings.

rooms.name: Your Compass Needle Spins Wildly
rooms.description: Your compass needle spins wildly, and you cannot get your bearings.

rooms.name: Your Compass Needle Spins Wildly
rooms.description: Your compass needle spins wildly, and you cannot get your bearings.

rooms.name: According To Prof
rooms.description:
According to Prof. TAA of MIT Tech, the rapidly changing magnetic
fields in the room are so intense as to cause you to be electrocuted.
I really don't know, but in any event, something has killed you.

rooms.name: According To Prof

fields in the room are so intense as to cause you to be electrocuted.
I really don't know, but in any event, something has killed you.

rooms.name: Outside A Large Gateway
rooms.description:
You are outside a large gateway, on which is inscribed:

	"Abandon every hope, all ye who enter here."

The gate is open.  Through it you can see a desolation, with a pile of
mangled corpses in one corner.  Thousands of voices, lamenting some
hideous fate, can be heard.
rooms.shortDescription: Outside A Large Gateway, On Which Is Inscribed:
